name: Maya Jungle Jewels Rotate and Match!
name_original: Maya Jungle Jewels Rotate and Match!
description:
The gem hidden in the depths of the Mayan jungle ,
Organs and traps everywhere,
Who can become a winner return fully loaded!

* 80 puzzles of carefully designed
* Gorgeous animation effects
* Easy to play and hard to master
* The perfect combination of strategy and luck
* One click to share,get a new way to show off to your friends in the social networking sites
* Keep getting high score,compete with the players around the world!
